# requestShareAccess(for:)

**Instance Method**

Requests share access for the specified URLs.

## Declaration

```swift
func requestShareAccess(for urls: [URL]) async throws -> [URL : Result<Void, any Error>]
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShareRequestAccessOperation] is the more configurable, [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation]-based alternative to this function
